titles: The triumphant chariot of antimony being a conscientious discovery of the many reall transcendent excellencies included in that minerall / written by Basil Valentine ... ; faithfully Englished and published for the common good by I.H. ...
author: Basilius Valentinus.
J. H. (John Harding), b. 1600 or 1601.
publisher: A. Lichfield], printed for Thomas Bruster, and are to be sold ... in London,
notes: Place of publication and publisher statement suggested by Wing.
